extendedInfo.description: Welcom to the Bloomy town, the most fun and addictive strategy game on your smartphone, origining from match 3 game, the basic rule is quite simple, 3 adjacent same items combine to a high level items, grasees turns to blush, trees turn to hut. 4 same items will earn higher scores, untill you fill all empty room on screen. During your building process, watch out those naughty bears, they kept bother your work, using sky lantern to make them become headstone... Plan carefully and be smart, get your unique town and the highest building.key features: easy to play and challenging to be skillfulbeautiful oriental secenesdaily free coins collect and SNS sharing rewardsmulti map and tools to choosewill keep update regularlykey words: match 3, triple town, puzzle game, zoma, qiuheti, yeti town, town building, bears, all ages, brain training,

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Actually better than tripletown ( which I hav been playin 4 months). Works smooth on sg note2. Pro: works offline; no need 2 buy anything!!
reviews.author: Sarah Sever

reviews.title: I am a big fan of triple town
reviews.comment: This bloomy town game is crap my phone is being sent out for repairs so this loaner phone doesn\'t allow triple town but it let me download this super crappy mock up version of it. Don\'t bother installing..
reviews.author: Stephanie Barron

reviews.title: Pure Addiction
reviews.comment: I absolutely cannot stop playing this game!! Everyday from when I wake up to going to bed, I try to use up all my turns. It hardly messes up and I highly recommend this game and the TripleTown version as well. :))
reviews.author: Maire Bear

reviews.title: Doesn\'t even open for me
reviews.comment: I was so excited about this game because I\'m such a triple town fan, but when I downloaded bloomy town it wouldn\'t even open. I will try to uninstall and relaod bloomy town to see if that makes it work. Untill it works I will keep my disappointing 1 star review. Samsung Galaxy S
reviews.author: Angelaa Weeks

reviews.title: Fun game to play!!! ;)
reviews.comment: HTC wildfire s
reviews.author: Mirren Derby

reviews.title: Bad quality rip off - don\'t bother downloading.
reviews.comment: This game (if you can call it that) is very bad quality, it\'s non responsive and the graphics are poor quality, a straight Triple Town rip off. Uninstalled after 2 minutes of horrible experience. Developer you should be ashamed of yourself. Don\'t bother with this.
reviews.author: Llies Meridja

reviews.title: Galaxy s4 - crashes
reviews.comment: Cant even open the app on my phone. Please fix!
reviews.author: Tina Chen

reviews.title: Gd game
reviews.comment: Needs to give u moves quicker. Really wish u would speed the moves up a bit, kinda annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This is a very poor copy of Triple Town. Graphics are rubbish and having to double tap to place is frustrating.  Un installing
reviews.author: Anwyn Barker

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Ever since I downloaded this game/app I can\'t stop playing!
reviews.author: Kirstie Hall

reviews.title: Copy cat
reviews.comment: The only different with tripletown is just the \"double tap\"? And yours is to laggy
reviews.author: Kanzi Huzaifah

reviews.title: Get Triple Town, this copy is awful
reviews.comment: You play much faster in TT, don\'t have to confirm your moves and see more variety... How hard is it for a Chinese company to hire a decent English speaker to do some translation too??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like triple town
reviews.comment: Less bears and i actually like that you have to double tap to make selection because i often immediately regret my choice, plus it shows u what will be combined so less mistakes. Love it! Great filler for when waiting on turns on TT.
reviews.author: Britini Martini

reviews.title: Bad Game
reviews.comment: As a huge fan of triple town, I thought this would be a good way to enjoy a similar game in between however I was disappointed with the game play. Anyone who thinks this is a substitute for triple town is mistaken.
reviews.author: Megan Cocks

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Not as good as triple town. Don\'t like having to double click to place item. How do I unlock more maps? coins don\'t build up quickly enough
reviews.author: Touryn Dae

reviews.title: Blatant copy
reviews.comment: Makes me sad to see such a lack of originality. Triple Town is a far superior game.
reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game but needs unlimited moves TT is better but I cant get it on my phone still good fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I downloaded this one when triple town wouldn\'t open on my phone...I don\'t like that you don\'t always have unlimited lives...triple town is better
reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

reviews.title: A good alternate to triple town.
reviews.comment: Good game play but the sounds are annoying and will not turn off even when settings are changed.Also the limited turns are too slow to recharge and  create limited fun. The Magic Fan needs an explanation as well
reviews.author: Robert Smith

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I can\'t get triple town on my phone version so this works great!
reviews.author: Emily Nunn
